title: American Babies - Knives and Teeth [2013][EAC,log,cue.FLAC]

Release: Knives and Teeth

Format: FLAC / Lossless / Log (100%) / Cue
Country: USA
Style: americana




Radio Promo Tracklisting
01 Cold Blooded (Radio Edit)
02 Bullseye Blues (Radio Edit)
03 When I Build My Fortune
04 Cold Blooded
05 Old Fashioned
06 Bullseye Blues
07 This Thing Ain't Goin' Nowheres
08 Goddamn
09 They Sing Old Time Religion
10 Running in Place
11 Fire Sale
12 Telephone



Recorded in Philadelphia and issued by Royal Potato Family Records, Knives and Teeth, the third long-player from ex-Brothers Past frontman Tom Hamilton's American Babies, continues mining the punk-Americana/neo-outlaw country vibe of previous outings like 2011's Flawed Logic and their 2008 eponymous debut, offering up a fiery and focused ten-track collection of new songs that engage on multiple levels. Described by Hamilton as a "forty-minute existential meltdown," Knives and Teeth tackles weighty subject matter including sin, redemption, politics, and mortality, with highlights arriving via standout cuts like "When I Build My Fortune," "Goddamn," "This Thing Ain't Going Nowheres," and "Bullseye Blues.".
